   - Perform the requested action (reply, schedule, send money, invoice/refund, etc.) if you tell me to.

2) Reply “Access inbox” and explicitly state which automatic actions I may take and any required details now so I can act without further prompts. Examples of what I may need:
   - Reply on your behalf: desired tone (formal/friendly) and key points to include.
   - Schedule a meeting: preferred date(s)/time windows, duration, participants' emails.
   - Send money: recipient IBAN, amount, subject, and date.
   - Process refund/invoice/order: order ID and any notes or amounts.
   - Forward/add attachments: recipient email(s) and message.

If unsure, paste the email (option 1) — that’s the quickest. What would you like me to do?
